name: Storybook Creator 4 Page
summary: Learn about .SBPAGE files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Storybook Creator is a program that allows you to design pages (SBPAGES in version 4 of the software) of a scrapbook, photo book, or wall calendar with text, photos, shapes, and other elements. You can then export the pages to be preserved digitally or printed and combined with other pages into a scrapbook, calendar, or another type of commemorative item.
NOTE: Creative Memories discontinued the development of Storybook Creator in 2014 as FOREVER acquired it and transformed it into Artisan software.

instructions: While Storybook Creator is discontinued and no longer available, you can open SBPAGE files with FOREVER Artisan in Windows. For example, you can open an SBPAGE file with version 5 and 6 of Artisan by selecting File â†’ Open.
FOREVER Artisan can convert SBPAGE files to various file types, including the following formats:
